\documentclass[pdftex,10pt,b5paper,twoside]{book}

% usikker på hvilke av disse to vi skal bruke, den underste er b5 og har større margin inn mot der arkene skal bli bundet.
\usepackage[lmargin=30mm,rmargin=20mm,tmargin=27mm,bmargin=30mm]{geometry}
%\usepackage[b5paper, inner=3cm, outer=2cm]{geometry}

\input{docsetup.tex}

\begin{document}

%% PART 1
%%The title page will be automatically generated and added by the DAIM system
%\input{content/intro/dedication.tex}		%% Optional

%% PART 2
\input{content/intro/abstract.tex}		%% Optional
\input{content/intro/sammendrag.tex}		%% Optional
\input{content/intro/project-description.tex}
\input{content/intro/preface.tex}		%% Optional
\input{content/list.tex}			%% Generate TOC, list of tables, and list of figures automatically
\input{content/abbreviations.tex}

%% PART 3 -- The Chapters
\input{content/chapters/chapter1.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter2.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter3.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter4.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter5.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter6.tex}
\input{content/chapters/chapter7.tex}

%% PART 4	%% Edit your references in "mylib.bib"
\input{references.tex}
\input{content/appendix/appendixA.tex}		
\input{content/appendix/appendixB.tex}
\input{content/appendix/appendixC.tex}
\input{content/appendix/appendixD.tex}

\end{document}
